Saeed Anwar (born 12 December 1978) is a Pakistani first-class cricketer who plays for Khan Research Laboratories.
He is a left-handed batsman and slow left-arm orthodox bowler. He is also known as Saeed Anwar Junior, to distinguish him from the famous Pakistani opening batsman Saeed Anwar.
